Here are the guidelines for the course's concluding project.
The project is based on [Kaggle's]() competitions.
You will be required to pick one of $5$ competitons, submit an entry, and report the process.

Guidelines:

1. Open an account at [Kaggle](https://www.kaggle.com/).
2. Pick one of the "Playground" competitions. These are: 
  - [Billion Word Imputations](https://www.kaggle.com/c/billion-word-imputation).
  - [Forest Cover Type Prediction](https://www.kaggle.com/c/forest-cover-type-prediction).
  - [Bike Sharing Demand](https://www.kaggle.com/c/bike-sharing-demand) (recommended). 
  - [Random Acts of Pizza](https://www.kaggle.com/c/random-acts-of-pizza).
  - [Poker Rule Induction](https://www.kaggle.com/c/poker-rule-induction).
3. Write a report documenting the process.
  - No longer than $8$ pages (not including appendices).
